DeleteClusterMachines.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tke.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeleteClusterMachines
<公共请求参数>

{
    "MachineNames": [
        "np-5tx2l4dc-hbbv6"
    ],
    "ClusterId": "cls-l9l1o3y0",
    "EnableScaleDown": false
}
DeleteClusterMachines.title: 删除原生节点池节点

DeleteHealthCheckPolicy.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tke.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeleteHealthCheckPolicy
<公共请求参数>

    "ClusterId": "cls-4h43fuxj",
    "HealthCheckPolicyName": "NP1"
}

RebootMachines.document: 该接口支持原生节点重启，重启时限制一次重启的原生节点数量最多为100个
RebootMachines.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tke.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: RebootMachines
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ClusterId": "cls-0dku0jec",
    "MachineNames": [
        "np-5tx2l4dc-4srqm",
        "np-5tx2l4dc-4srqn"
    ],
    "StopType": "soft"
}
RebootMachines.title: 重启原生节点实例
